thread.title_full: Great hotel in the middle of Manhatten - Review of DoubleTree Suites by Hilton Hotel New York City - Times Square, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: Damaris N
title: Great hotel in the middle of Manhatten - Review
text: This hotel will not disappoint. In the middle of Times Square and within walking distance of almost anything you would need to experience. Broadway is right at your fingertips. If you go just a little off Times Square, Hell's Kitchen is an amazing place with great restaurants.
